StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteCurrentFyVisitRecap]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CurrentFyVisitRecapId uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- informa.on for an exisi.ng record can be inserted. IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[CurrentFYVisitRecap] where CurrentFyVisitRecapId = @CurrentFyVisitRecapId and @CurrentFyVisitRecapId IS NOT NULL)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
DELETE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CurrentFYVisitRecap] WHERE CurrentFyVisitRecapId = @CurrentFyVisitRecapId END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
